name: Health++ Clicker Game
description:
CONTROLS: W, A, S,  D or Arrow Keys for moving & LMB for clicking.

INSTRUCTIONS: 

Get yourself to 100 health before timer runs out.

Click on enemies multiple times to kill them.

But Beware! As enemies can also hurt you.

You start with 15 health and have 2 minutes to win.

Try not to get lost.

NOTE:

You can change the volume of the game in the options menu.

Clicking on Quit button will stop the game and you will have to reload the page to play it again.

This game was made during and for the MFGJ Game Jam Summer 2022 (Unfortunately, I couldn't submit it on time).

NOW AVAILABLE FOR ANDROID! Note: While moving, you cannot attack.

UPCOMING UPDATES:

Game becomes easier (a bit)!

You won't get lost so easily!

Leaderboard/High Score!

Story & New characters!

???

COMMENTS ARE APPRECIATED!

HAVE FUN!
